name: A Golden Ring Worth of Pennies
name_original: A Golden Ring Worth of Pennies
description:
Made for Juice Jam II, with the theme "Paying the price".
The theme was interpreted through the loss of items on death, spending money to upgrade your abilities, and as an overall theme in the story.

Story

Liya, an assassin, strives to improve her situation by setting on a quest to find the mythic wish-granting ring in an ever-changing maze...

Gameplay

Dash through enemies to deal them damage! Randomized action through different biomes... Learn each enemy's behavior, come up with tactics, and overcome opposition! Become more and more powerful by using their loot, such as items to spice up the gameplay, or gold to spend and upgrade your stats!

Controls can be found in-game, but here they are:

AbilityKeyboardControllerMove
ArrowsD-Pad
Left JoystickAttack/AcceptZAInteract/DeclineXXExplosionCR1MenuEscStart Read before playing: Dashing is not only an evasive method, it deals damage too! It's your main way of dealing damage!

Explosion ability deals 5x damage, but also damages the player and stuns them.

An enemy can drop nothing, gold, or an item. Gold can be exchanged for character growth at the fountain after beating a boss. An item will always spawn after 14 non-item drops.

The game was designed with controller support in mind. As such, please navigate the interface by using the keys when playing on keyboard, as the mouse might not always work when clicking on buttons.

If you experience a bad roll at the procedural generation, such as a completely isolated room you can't enter/exit, close the game. Your progress is saved, but not the layout, so you can have another go at the generation.
